item.title: A2iA
item.description: A2iA (now part of Mitek Systems) is a provider of specialized intelligent document recognition and processing software. The company focuses on handwriting recognition, text extraction, and document classification technologies.

item.title: ABBYY
item.description: ABBYY is a global provider of intelligent document processing, content AI, and language solutions. The company is known for its advanced OCR (Optical Character Recognition) technology and document capture solutions.

item.title: ADOC Solutions
item.description: ADOC Solutions is a specialized provider of document management and processing solutions based in Europe. The company focuses on intelligent document capture, processing, and archiving solutions.

item.title: AIIM (Association for Intelligent Information Management)
item.description: AIIM is a global non-profit organization that provides education, research, and certification programs to information professionals. While not a traditional IDP vendor, AIIM plays a crucial role in the IDP ecosystem by providing standards, best practices, and professional development for intelligent information management.

item.title: Altilia
item.description: Altilia is an AI company specializing in intelligent document processing and knowledge extraction solutions. The company focuses on transforming unstructured data into actionable business insights using artificial intelligence.

item.title: Amagno
item.description: Amagno is a German enterprise content management (ECM) and document management system (DMS) provider that offers intelligent document processing capabilities with a focus on digital document workflows and automation.

item.title: AntWorks
item.description: AntWorks is a global provider of artificial intelligence and intelligent automation solutions, with a focus on fractal science-based technology for data ingestion and processing.

item.title: Apache PDFBox
item.description: Apache PDFBox is an open-source Java library for working with PDF documents. While not a traditional IDP vendor, it provides essential functionality for PDF manipulation and text extraction that serves as a foundation for many document processing solutions.

item.title: Appian
item.description: Appian is a low-code automation platform provider that offers document processing capabilities as part of its comprehensive business process automation solutions.

item.title: Aptean
item.description: Aptean is a global provider of industry-specific enterprise software solutions, including document management and processing capabilities tailored to various industries.

item.title: Archiv-IT
item.description: Archiv-IT is a specialized provider of document digitization, archiving, and management solutions, with a focus on secure and compliant document processing.

item.title: ARCO
item.description: ARCO is a provider of document management and digital transformation solutions, specializing in document digitization, processing, and business process automation.

item.title: Astera
item.description: Astera is a data management software company that provides data integration, ETL (Extract, Transform, Load), and document processing solutions. Their products help organizations automate data flows and extract valuable information from various document types.

item.title: Attri.AI
item.description: Attri.AI is an AI-powered agent platform that leverages artificial intelligence to automate document processing and workflows. The company focuses on providing autonomous AI agents that can understand, process, and act on information from various document sources.

item.title: Aurexus
item.description: Aurexus is a provider of business process automation and document processing solutions, focusing on digital transformation and intelligent automation.

item.title: Axis AI
item.description: Axis AI provides intelligent document processing solutions that leverage artificial intelligence to automate data extraction and document processing workflows.

item.title: Base64.ai
item.description: Base64.ai provides advanced document AI solutions for automated data extraction from documents, IDs, and forms using artificial intelligence.

item.title: Blue Prism
item.description: Blue Prism is a leading provider of robotic process automation (RPA) solutions, offering intelligent document processing capabilities as part of its intelligent automation platform.

item.title: Box
item.description: Box is a leading cloud content management platform that enables organizations to securely manage, share, and collaborate on their content from anywhere, on any device, while maintaining enterprise-grade security and compliance.

item.title: BuildSimple
item.description: BuildSimple provides low-code/no-code intelligent document processing and workflow automation solutions designed to simplify complex business processes.
